title: Wind-up Knight
snippet: Is a high-end, action-packed, 3D side-scrolling adventure game, and it’s here to show you how games are supposed to be played.Guide your Wind-up Knight through devilish levels–over 50 in all–to rescue the Princess from the clutches of the evil Black Knight.
